column.name: as_id
column.remarks: Clé primaire, identifiant de l'activité sportive

column.name: acc_id
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, ID de l'alerte associée

column.name: acc_fk_activite_id
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, ID de l'activité sportive associée à l'accident

column.name: acc_fk_blessure_id
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, ID de la blessure

column.name: acc_recherche_vehicule
column.remarks: Informations sur le/les véhicule(s) de la personne recherchée

column.name: acc_fk_condition_meteo_id
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, ID de la condition météorologique

column.name: acc_fk_etat_vent_id
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, ID de l'état venteux

table.name: asm_alerte_general
table.remarks: Informations générales d'une alerte (section 'Alerte' de l'onglet 'Alerte')

column.name: ag_moyen
column.remarks: Moyen par lequel l'alerte a été donnée

column.name: ag_conference
column.remarks: (Booléen) S'il y a eu conférence entre les différents organismes de secours

column.name: ag_confcodis
column.remarks: (Booléen) CODIS présent lors de la conférence

column.name: ag_confsamu
column.remarks: (Booléen) SAMU présent lors de la conférence

column.name: ag_confcorg
column.remarks: (Booléen) CORG présent lors de la conférence

column.name: ag_confpghm
column.remarks: (Booléen) PGHM présent lors de la conférence

column.name: ag_confrequerant
column.remarks: (Booléen) Requérant présent lors de la conférence

column.name: ag_telephone
column.remarks: Numéro de téléphone utilisé pour donner l'alerte

table.name: asm_alerte_gestion_secours
table.remarks: Informations sur la gestion du secours (section 'Gestion du secours' de l'onglet 'Alerte')

column.name: ags_id
column.remarks: Clé primaire, identifiant de la gestion du secours

column.name: ags_fk_alerte_general_id
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, ID de l'alerte associée

column.name: ags_fk_entite_secours_id_cs
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, ID du chef de salle (anciennement 'gs')

column.name: ags_fk_entite_secours_id_op
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, ID de l'officier de permanence

column.name: al_id
column.remarks: Clé primaire, identifiant de la localisation de l'alerte

column.name: al_fk_alerte_general_id
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, ID de l'alerte associée

column.name: al_fk_lieu_id
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, ID du lieu de l'alerte

column.name: bl_id
column.remarks: Clé primaire, identifiant de la blessure

column.name: co_id
column.remarks: Clé primaire, identifiant de la commune

column.name: cm_id
column.remarks: Clé primaire, identifiant de la condition météorologique

table.name: asm_configuration_unite
table.remarks: Unité gérant les alertes et les configurations (Mode avancé, configuration unité)

column.name: cu_id
column.remarks: Clé primaire, identifiant de l'unité de configuration

column.name: de_id
column.remarks: Clé primaire, identifiant de la data_exchange

table.name: asm_deroulement
table.remarks: Déroulement des opérations liés à une alerte (onglet 'Déroulement')

column.name: dr_id
column.remarks: Clé primaire, identifiant du déroulement des opérations

column.name: dr_fk_alerte_general_id
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, ID de l'alerte associée

column.name: dr_actions_gdh
column.remarks: GDH (Groupe Date-heure) de chaque action menée lors des opérations (tableau). Entrée correspondante avec dr_actions.

column.name: dr_actions
column.remarks: Liste des actions menées lors des opérations (tableau). Entrée correspondante avec dr_actions_gdh.

table.name: asm_entite_secours
table.remarks: Entité de secours (personnel soignant, secouristes ou équipages, hélicoptère)

column.name: es_id
column.remarks: Clé primaire, Identifiant de l'entité de secours

column.name: es_type
column.remarks: Médecin, secouriste, équipage, hélicoptère, équipe cynophile, ou autre

column.name: es_organisme
column.remarks: Organisme auquel appartient l'entité de secours

column.name: ec_id
column.remarks: Clé primaire, identifiant de l'etat clinique

column.name: ev_id
column.remarks: Clé primaire, identifiant de l'état du vent

column.name: li_fk_massif_id
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, ID du massif associé

column.name: li_fk_commune_id
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, ID de la commune associée

column.name: le_id
column.remarks: Clé primaire, identifiant du lieu d'évacuation

table.name: asm_moyen_engage
table.remarks: Moyen engagé pour une alerte en particulier

column.name: mo_id
column.remarks: Clé primaire, identifiant du duo alerte-moyen engagé

column.name: mo_fk_alerte_general_id
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, ID de l'alerte associée

column.name: mo_fk_entite_secours_id
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, ID de l'entité de secours engagée pour la dite alerte

column.name: na_id
column.remarks: Clé primaire, identifiant de la nationalité

column.name: rg_fk_alerte_general_id
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, ID de l'alerte associée

column.name: rg_circonstances
column.remarks: Renseignements sur les circonstances de l'accident

column.name: rg_mesures_prises
column.remarks: Renseignements sur les mesures prises lors de l'accident

column.name: rg_fk_entite_secours_id
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, ID de la personne ayant suivi l'affaire

column.name: vi_id
column.remarks: Clé primaire, identifiant de la victime

column.name: vi_fk_alerte_general_id
column.remarks: Clé secondaire, identifiant de l'alerte associée à la victime

column.name: vi_naissance_date
column.remarks: Date de naissance de la victime

column.name: vi_naissance_lieu
column.remarks: Lieu de naissance de la victime

column.name: vi_filiation
column.remarks: Noms et prénoms de la famille de la victime

column.name: vi_fk_etat_clinique_id
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, identifiant de l'état clinique

column.name: vi_blessures
column.remarks: Liste des blessures de la victime

column.name: vi_fk_lieu_evacuation_id
column.remarks: Clé étrangère, ID du lieu d'évacuation

column.name: zg_id
column.remarks: Clé primaire, identifiant de la zone géographique

table.name: geography_columns
table.viewSql: SELECT current_database() AS f_table_catalog, n.nspname AS f_table_schema, c.relname AS f_table_name, a.attname AS f_geography_column, postgis_typmod_dims(a.atttypmod) AS coord_dimension, postgis_typmod_srid(a.atttypmod) AS srid, postgis_typmod_type(a.atttypmod) AS type FROM pg_class c, pg_attribute a, pg_type t, pg_namespace n WHERE ((t.typname = 'geography'::name) AND (a.attisdropped = false) AND (a.atttypid = t.oid) AND (a.attrelid = c.oid) AND (c.relnamespace = n.oid) AND (c.relkind = ANY (ARRAY['r'::"char", 'v'::"char", 'm'::"char", 'f'::"char", 'p'::"char"])) AND (NOT pg_is_other_temp_schema(c.relnamespace)) AND has_table_privilege(c.oid, 'SELECT'::text));

table.name: geometry_columns
table.viewSql: SELECT (current_database())::character varying(256) AS f_table_catalog, n.nspname AS f_table_schema, c.relname AS f_table_name, a.attname AS f_geometry_column, COALESCE(postgis_typmod_dims(a.atttypmod), sn.ndims, 2) AS coord_dimension, COALESCE(NULLIF(postgis_typmod_srid(a.atttypmod), 0), sr.srid, 0) AS srid, (replace(replace(COALESCE(NULLIF(upper(postgis_typmod_type(a.atttypmod)), 'GEOMETRY'::text), st.type, 'GEOMETRY'::text), 'ZM'::text, ''::text), 'Z'::text, ''::text))::character varying(30) AS type FROM ((((((pg_class c JOIN pg_attribute a ON (((a.attrelid = c.oid) AND (NOT a.attisdropped)))) JOIN pg_namespace n ON ((c.relnamespace = n.oid))) JOIN pg_type t ON ((a.atttypid = t.oid))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s.connamespace, s.conrelid, s.conkey, replace(split_part(s.consrc, ''''::text, 2), ')'::text, ''::text) AS type FROM pg_constraint s WHERE (s.consrc ~~* '%geometrytype(% = %'::text)) st ON (((st.connamespace = n.oid) AND (st.conrelid = c.oid) AND (a.attnum = ANY (st.conkey))))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s.connamespace, s.conrelid, s.conkey, (replace(split_part(s.consrc, ' = '::text, 2), ')'::text, ''::text))::integer AS ndims FROM pg_constraint s WHERE (s.consrc ~~* '%ndims(% = %'::text)) sn ON (((sn.connamespace = n.oid) AND (sn.conrelid = c.oid) AND (a.attnum = ANY (sn.conkey))))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s.connamespace, s.conrelid, s.conkey, (replace(replace(split_part(s.consrc, ' = '::text, 2), ')'::text, ''::text), '('::text, ''::text))::integer AS srid FROM pg_constraint s WHERE (s.consrc ~~* '%srid(% = %'::text)) sr ON (((sr.connamespace = n.oid) AND (sr.conrelid = c.oid) AND (a.attnum = ANY (sr.conkey))))) WHERE ((c.relkind = ANY (ARRAY['r'::"char", 'v'::"char", 'm'::"char", 'f'::"char", 'p'::"char"])) AND (NOT (c.relname = 'raster_columns'::name)) AND (t.typname = 'geometry'::name) AND (NOT pg_is_other_temp_schema(c.relnamespace)) AND has_table_privilege(c.oid, 'SELECT'::text));

table.name: raster_columns
table.viewSql: SELECT current_database() AS r_table_catalog, n.nspname AS r_table_schema, c.relname AS r_table_name, a.attname AS r_raster_column, COALESCE(_raster_constraint_info_srid(n.nspname, c.relname, a.attname), ( SELECT st_srid('010100000000000000000000000000000000000000'::geometry) AS st_srid)) AS srid, _raster_constraint_info_scale(n.nspname, c.relname, a.attname, 'x'::bpchar) AS scale_x, _raster_constraint_info_scale(n.nspname, c.relname, a.attname, 'y'::bpchar) AS scale_y, _raster_constraint_info_blocksize(n.nspname, c.relname, a.attname, 'width'::text) AS blocksize_x, _raster_constraint_info_blocksize(n.nspname, c.relname, a.attname, 'height'::text) AS blocksize_y, COALESCE(_raster_constraint_info_alignment(n.nspname, c.relname, a.attname), false) AS same_alignment, COALESCE(_raster_constraint_info_regular_blocking(n.nspname, c.relname, a.attname), false) AS regular_blocking, _raster_constraint_info_num_bands(n.nspname, c.relname, a.attname) AS num_bands, _raster_constraint_info_pixel_types(n.nspname, c.relname, a.attname) AS pixel_types, _raster_constraint_info_nodata_values(n.nspname, c.relname, a.attname) AS nodata_values, _raster_constraint_info_out_db(n.nspname, c.relname, a.attname) AS out_db, _raster_constraint_info_extent(n.nspname, c.relname, a.attname) AS extent, COALESCE(_raster_constraint_info_index(n.nspname, c.relname, a.attname), false) AS spatial_index FROM pg_class c, pg_attribute a, pg_type t, pg_namespace n WHERE ((t.typname = 'raster'::name) AND (a.attisdropped = false) AND (a.atttypid = t.oid) AND (a.attrelid = c.oid) AND (c.relnamespace = n.oid) AND (c.relkind = ANY (ARRAY['r'::"char", 'v'::"char", 'm'::"char", 'f'::"char", 'p'::"char"])) AND (NOT pg_is_other_temp_schema(c.relnamespace)) AND has_table_privilege(c.oid, 'SELECT'::text));

table.name: raster_overviews
table.viewSql: SELECT current_database() AS o_table_catalog, n.nspname AS o_table_schema, c.relname AS o_table_name, a.attname AS o_raster_column, current_database() AS r_table_catalog, (split_part(split_part(s.consrc, '''::name'::text, 1), ''''::text, 2))::name AS r_table_schema, (split_part(split_part(s.consrc, '''::name'::text, 2), ''''::text, 2))::name AS r_table_name, (split_part(split_part(s.consrc, '''::name'::text, 3), ''''::text, 2))::name AS r_raster_column, (btrim(split_part(s.consrc, ','::text, 2)))::integer AS overview_factor FROM pg_class c, pg_attribute a, pg_type t, pg_namespace n, pg_constraint s WHERE ((t.typname = 'raster'::name) AND (a.attisdropped = false) AND (a.atttypid = t.oid) AND (a.attrelid = c.oid) AND (c.relnamespace = n.oid) AND ((c.relkind)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['r'::character(1), 'v'::character(1), 'm'::character(1), 'f'::character(1)])::text[])) AND (s.connamespace = n.oid) AND (s.conrelid = c.oid) AND (s.consrc ~~ '%_overview_constraint(%'::text) AND (NOT pg_is_other_temp_schema(c.relnamespace)) AND has_table_privilege(c.oid, 'SELECT'::text));
